## Adicionando multiplos marcadores

```{r , echo=FALSE}
set.seed(2016-04-25)
df <- data.frame(lat = runif(20, min = 39.2, max = 39.3),
                 lng = runif(20, min = -76.6, max = -76.5))

my_map <- df %>% 
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers()

my_map
```
